AmazonSQS::list_queues ( $  queue_name_prefix = null,
$  returnCurlHandle = null 
)

List Queues

The ListQueues action returns a list of your queues. A maximum 1000 queue URLs are returned. If you specify a value for the optional QueueNamePrefix parameter, only queues with a name beginning with the specified value are returned.

public

Parameters:
string $queue_name_prefix (Optional) String to use for filtering the list results. Only those queues whose name begins with the specified string are returned.
boolean $returnCurlHandle (Optional) A private toggle that will return the CURL handle for the request rather than actually completing the request. This is useful for MultiCURL requests.
Returns:
TarzanHTTPResponse
See also:
http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSSimpleQueueService/2008-01-01/SQSDeveloperGuide/Query_QueryListQueues.html
